## What is FEDON?

* Umbrella organisation for PhD and Post-doc students at the University of Iceland
* Your helping hand if you need it
    - Facebook: [https://www.facebook.com/FedonHI](https://www.facebook.com/FedonHI)
    - Twitter: [](https://twitter.com/FedonHI)
    - Email: fedon@hi.is
    
## Board Positions

* Representative in the union (Félag Háskólakennara)
* Representative at the Student Council
* Representative at the Graduate School (Miðstöð Framhaldsnáms)
* Representative at the Science Board
* Manage our web page and social media
* Treasurer
* Secretary
* Chairperson

## Annal 2022 - 2023

* Held seven meetings
* Held two (small) social gatherings
* Main issues
    - University of Iceland Doctoral Grants
    - Student Loan System
    - Better working conditions for Postdocs
    - [Opinion piece together with Hugdok, Menntadoc and Seigla criticizing austerity measures at the University](https://www.visir.is/g/20232404316d/adhaldsadgerdir-ogna-nylidun-innan-haskolasamfelagsins-rannsoknum-og-thekkingarskopun-a-islandi)
